Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameInfo

Class PlayerInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameInfo.PlayerInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerInfo extends Object implements Serializable
This immutable class is used for transferring the data to be updated from the server to the client
